data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 8,292 believers in the county of Badgam.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Badgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Badgam.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Badgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
Spirit, fill the 753,800 souls living in the county of Badgam with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Galleban people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Badgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Badgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 753,800 citizens of Badgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

location.name: Badgam
location.people_groups_list: Gaddi (Muslim traditions), Saryara (Muslim traditions), Lonpa, Naar, Budhan (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gaddi (Muslim traditions) (431,000), Saryara (Muslim traditions) (2,000), Lonpa (900), Naar (300), Budhan (Hindu traditions) (100)
